type: REPAIR AND MAINTENANCE OF VOLVO PENTA EQUIPMENT
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Request for Standing Offer for Volvo Penta equipment repair and maintenance *Diesel engines*
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on May 24th 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is issuing this request for standing offer (RFSO) for to provide, on an as-needed basis, a repair service including the supply of spare parts on Volvo Penta Marine Recreational and Commercial Marine series engines and transmissions for all Fisheries and Oceans Canada - Canadian Coast Guard vessels, Central and Arctic Region, St. Lawrence and Great Lakes area, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
# Tender Title and Description

## Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

### Tender Number and Amendment Information

* **Title:** Supply of Repair and Maintenance Services for Volvo Penta Marine Recreational and Commercial Marine Engines and Transmissions
* **Reference Number:** WS3996416753
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3996416753
* **Amendment Number:** None

### Tender Notice Details

* **Publication Date:** May 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 24, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 31, 2024

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Service (SRV)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Region and Deliverables

* **Regions of Opportunity:** Burlington, Quebec (except National Capital Region), Sorel-Tracy, Amherstburg, Parry Sound, and Mont-Joli
* **Deliverables:** Repair service, including spare parts supply, for all Fisheries and Oceans Canada - Canadian Coast Guard vessels, Central and Arctic Region, St. Lawrence and Great Lakes area.

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Ioana Novac (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [ioana.novac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ioana.novac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16223514?extsite=MTYyMjM1MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16223514?extsite=MTYyMjM1MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Notes

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before 2 PM EDT on May 24th
